word: H1878 - דָּשֵׁן - dâshên - daw-shane' - Accept - ஏற்றுக்கொள்

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கொழுத்திரு, சாம்பலறவிலக்கு அபிஷேகம்பண்ணு. சாம்பலை எடு. ஏற்றுக்கொள், பூரி, புஷ்டியாயிரு, செழி
to be fat, to grow fat, to become fat, to become prosperous, to anoint
2) to find fat (used of offering, acceptable)
d) (Hothpael) to fatten oneself (of Jehovah's (Yahweh's) sword)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to be fat; transitively to fatten (or regard as fat); specifically to anoint; figuratively to satisfy; denominatively (from H1880) to remove (fat) ashes (of sacrifices): - accept, anoint, take away the (receive) ashes (from), make (wax) fat.
Cognate: H1878, H1879, H1880, H1881, H1885, H1886
